entities.name: philosopher's stone
entities.description: The Philosopher's Stone is mentioned as something that Harry Potter has against his leg. It is not clear what the stone is or its significance, but it seems to be a valuable object.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is a teacher at Hogwarts who is speaking in a high voice. He is not moving his lips and seems to be possessed by some kind of dark force.

entities.name: devil's snare
entities.description: Devil's Snare is a magical plant that is described as rooting Harry Potter to the spot. It seems to be a powerful and intimidating entity.

relationships.description: Quirrell is seemingly controlled by the dark force that has taken over his body, which is described as being rooted to the spot by Devil's Snare.
Quirrell is interrogating Harry Potter, demanding that he tell the truth about what he saw.
